short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest, fastest way to switch between languages of coros sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a tool for developers, PMs, designers, and other team members of coros.com, this extension's target is switching between different language sites of  coros.com, like jp.coros.com, fr.coros.com, etc. It's very convenient to modify the lang key in the URL manually again and again.
